#### Tender Description
The Correctional Service of Canada is seeking proposals to provide simulation training services for front-line nurses on the Nursing Clinical Protocols (NCP) for Emergency Situations. The proposed services must meet the objectives outlined below:

* Provide training and certification on NCP in accordance with provincial laws, regulations, and professional practice standards for nurses.
* Offer hands-on skills training for early identification of patient deterioration and intervention to prevent emergency situations.
* Deliver a one-day intensive course for nurses, focusing on updated nursing protocols and technical skills required to enact the protocols.

The selected contractor must provide:

* Clinical simulations with a minimum of 16 scenarios per session
* Training materials, supplies, and medical equipment
* Support during all clinical simulation sessions
* Instructors for clinical simulations (number determined by participant count)
* Preparation, simulation, and debriefing for nurses
* Certificate or completion checklist for successful participants

#### Tender Information

* Tender Closing Date: December 18, 2023, at 15:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: January 1, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: May 30, 2026
